data.title: The History & Adventures of Joseph Andrews Henry Fielding Folio Society 1953
data.meta_description: This was the first published full-length novel of the English author and magistrate Henry Fielding
data.text:
Description

The History and Adventures of Joseph Andrews and His Friend Mr Abraham Adams

This was the first published full-length novel of the English author and magistrate Henry Fielding, and indeed among the first novels in the English language. Published in 1742 and defined by Fielding as a “comic epic poem in prose”, it is the story of a good-natured footman's adventures on the road home from London with his friend and mentor, the absent-minded parson Abraham Adams.

Features;

Second Edition Folio Society No. 56

Publisher Folio Society, London; 1967

Decorated Brown Cloth Hardback, 304 pp

Wood Engravings by Derrick Harris

Size 230 x 150mm, 950g

Condition: Fine – Superb Unmarked Copy
